document.full_text: the strongest films have benefited from 3-d, but consumers are rejecting middling movies that employ the technology to wring more money from moviegoers.
document.title: 3-d starts to fizzle, and hollywood frets
lines_and_colors: the strongest films have benefited from 3-d, but consumers are rejecting middling movies that employ the technology to wring more money from moviegoers.
